      • Login

        public int Login(java.lang.String username,
                 java.lang.String password)
        Hit the server with the login info and return a username or failure code.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Returns:
        0 if success, -1 if incorrect password, -2 if user not found

      • ContinueAsGuest

        public int ContinueAsGuest()
        Call the server to create a temporary user and give back the userID
        Returns:
        0 if success, -1 if something went wrong (it shouldn't).

      • Register

        public int Register(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
        To register a user. Pass in the desired username/password.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Returns:
        0 if success, -1 if username exists, -2 otherwise

      • CreateGame

        public int CreateGame(int playerNumber)
        Create a game and return the gameID
        Parameters:
        playerNumber - 1 if white selected, 2 if black selected
        Returns:
        The gameID if successful, -1 if error

      • WaitForOpponent

        public boolean WaitForOpponent()
        Spin while waiting for opponent to the current game
        Returns:
        True if an opponent joined, False if there was an issue

      • JoinGame

        public boolean JoinGame(int gameID)
        Have the player join the specified game
        Parameters:
        gameID -
        Returns:
        True if successful, False if not (Game full or invalid)

      • GetJoinableGames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> GetJoinableGames()
        Get a list of joinable games
        Returns:
        A list of joinable gameID's

      • GetPlayerNumber

        public int GetPlayerNumber()
        Get the player number.
        Returns:
        1 if player 1, 2 if player 2, 0 if neither

      • IsPlayersTurn

        public boolean IsPlayersTurn()
        Simple check to assert that it's the players turn. Should be checked before attempting to play a move or getPossibleMoves.
        Returns:
        True if it's the current players turn, false if not.

        Returns:

        Check if a move is valid, and if it is then send it to the server.

        Returns:
        True if move is valid and submitted, false otherwise

        public boolean EndState()
        Whether or not the game is in an End game state.
        Returns:
        True if EndState, False otherwise.

        Returns:

      • InCheck

        public int InCheck()
        Check if either player is in check
        Returns:
        0 if neither player in check, 1 if white in check, 2 if black in check
